name: js-lib-go

author: Ramiro M

scripts.build:bundle: bun build --minify --splitting ./index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --footer="// built with love in GDL ðŸ«€"
scripts.build:all: rm -rf dist && bun run build:bundle && bun run build:types

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && bun run publish:npm
